TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlColumnEncryptionCspProvider extends System.Data.SqlClient.SqlColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProvider

summary.span: The CMK Store provider implementation for using Microsoft CAPI based Cryptographic Service Providers (CSP) with [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

span.span: The CMK Store provider implementation for using Microsoft CAPI based Cryptographic Service Providers (CSP) with [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以儲存永遠加密資料行主要金鑰的金鑰存放區中，例如硬體安全性模組 (HSM)，支援 Microsoft CAPI 基礎密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Enables storing Always Encrypted column master key keys in a store, such as a hardware security module (HSM), that supports the Microsoft CAPI based Cryptographic Service Providers (CSP).

summary.span: Decrypts the given encrypted value using an asymmetric key specified by the key path and algorithm.

span.span: Decrypts the given encrypted value using an asymmetric key specified by the key path and algorithm.

summary.span: The key path will be in the format of [ProviderName]/KeyIdentifier and should be an asymmetric key stored in the specified CSP provider.

span.span: The key path will be in the format of [ProviderName]/KeyIdentifier and should be an asymmetric key stored in the specified CSP provider.

summary.span: The valid algorithm used to encrypt/decrypt the CEK is 'RSA_OAEP'.

span.span: The valid algorithm used to encrypt/decrypt the CEK is 'RSA_OAEP'.
The decrypted column encryption key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應的金鑰存放區提供者必須實作方法。The method must be implemented by the corresponding key store providers. 應使用機碼路徑所識別的非對稱金鑰和簽章所組成的主要金鑰中繼資料`masterKeyPath`， `allowEnclaveComputations`，及 providerName。 should use an asymmetric key identified by a key path and sign the masterkey metadata consisting of `masterKeyPath`, `allowEnclaveComputations`, and providerName.

span.span: In all cases.

summary.span: This function must be implemented by the corresponding Key Store providers.

summary.span: This function should use an asymmetric key identified by a key path and sign the masterkey metadata consisting of (masterKeyPath, allowEnclaveComputations, providerName).
